Query: select ifnull(avg(qtyperinvoice),0) as averagequantityperinv from(select sum(sid.quantity) as qtyperinvoice, si.id_sales_invoice from sales_invoice as si left join sales_invoice_detail as sid on si.id_sales_invoice = sid.id_sales_invoice where si.trans_date between * StartDate * and * EndDate * group by si.id_sales_invoice) as QuantityPerInvoice
Caption: Average Quantity Per Invoice
